title: The Library: A Place to Learn and Explore
story: Today we are going to the library. What is library, Ms. Thomas? It is a place to study, Betty. What do they have there? Books, computers, classes, and more. That sounds like fun. It is, Betty. And you can learn there. I can't wait to go. Let's go!
summary: Discover the wonders of the library, a place filled with books, computers, and classes where you can learn and explore.
image: An image of a library with shelves of books and people studying.
